short_description: Identifies grid cells within an input DEM that may be impacted by edge contamination for hydrological applications.

parameters.name: Input DEM Raster
parameters.description: Name of the input DEM raster file; must be depressionless.

parameters.name: Output Raster File
parameters.description: Name of the output raster file.

parameters.name: Flow Type
parameters.description: Flow algorithm type, one of 'd8', 'mfd', or 'dinf'

parameters.name: Z Conversion Factor
parameters.description: Optional multiplier for when the vertical and horizontal units are not the same.
